LanguageData.ReqRowTipLine2Excess: \n\n{0} {1} will remain after blueprints are built. {2} {1} is present and unforbidden on the map.
LanguageData.ReqRowTipLine2Lack: \n\n{0} more {1} is required to fully build selected blueprints. {2} {1} is present and unforbidden on the map.
LanguageData.TotalsSortModes_AbsoluteTip: Displays required materials to build selected blueprints. For partially finished frames, the amount missing is displayed.\n\nUse this for general planning.
LanguageData.TotalsSortModes_DifferenceTip: Displays required materials minus unforbidden materials on the map. Positive numbers indicate how much more you need, negative numbers indicate how much will be left over.\n\nUse this to decide how much material to craft, mine, trade or steal.
